author: Special Correspondent
text:
A group of gypsies from Valliyoor thanked Collector M. Karunakaran for having ordered the distribution of free mixer grinder, fan and wet grinder to them and for his efforts to open a special school for their children.

Petition submitted

When the gypsies of Park Town on the outskirts of Valliyoor earlier submitted a petition to the Collector seeking the early disbursal of the freebies, Dr. Karunakaran ordered officials to ensure that the freebies had reached the beneficiaries at the earliest.

The gypsies appealed to him to open a special school in their colony for the benefit of their children and the Collector assured that he would look into this issue.

They also appealed to the Collector to take steps for installing public drinking water taps in adequate numbers in their colony.
title: Gypsies seek special school at Valliyoor
